c.id, c.name, c.type, c.city_area_id, c.address, c.lng, c.lat, c.created, c.creator, c.status, c.followers, c.leader, c.leader_tel, c.business_manager, c.deposit_bank, c.bank_account, c.bank_account_holder, c.shop_area, c.logo, c.grade, c.service_tel, c.service_staff, c.no,c.leaderName,c.founder_name,c.company_info,c.contract_time,c.contract_expired_date,c.note,c.scope_business,c.standby_links
c.*,u.avatar,b.value sexValue,u.birthday,u.mobile,bb.value educationValue,basis.identity_number identityNumber,r.name roleName,info.entry_time entryTime,bbb.value statusName
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company(id, name, type, city_area_id, address, lng, lat, created, creator, status, followers, leader, leader_tel, business_manager, deposit_bank, bank_account, bank_account_holder, shop_area, logo, grade, service_tel, service_staff, no,founder_name,company_info,contract_time,contract_expired_date,note,branch_id,retire_net_time,scope_business,standby_links) VALUES(#{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{cityAreaId}, #{address}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{created}, #{creator}, #{status}, #{followers}, #{leader}, #{leaderTel}, #{businessManager}, #{depositBank}, #{bankAccount}, #{bankAccountHolder}, #{shopArea}, #{logo}, #{grade}, #{serviceTel}, #{serviceStaff}, #{no},#{founderName},#{companyInfo},#{contractTime},#{contractExpiredDate},#{note},#{branchId},#{retireNetTime},#{scopeBusiness},#{standbyLinks})
mapper.update:
UPDATE company
name = #{name},
type = #{type},
city_area_id = #{cityAreaId},
address = #{address},
lng = #{lng},
lat = #{lat},
status = #{status},
followers = #{followers},
leader = #{leader},
leader_tel = #{leaderTel},
business_manager = #{businessManager},
deposit_bank = #{depositBank},
bank_account = #{bankAccount},
bank_account_holder = #{bankAccountHolder},
shop_area = #{shopArea},
logo = #{logo},
grade = #{grade},
service_tel = #{serviceTel},
service_staff = #{serviceStaff},
no = #{no},
founder_name = #{founderName},
company_info = #{companyInfo},
contract_time = #{contractTime},
contract_expired_date = #{contractExpiredDate},
note = #{note},
retire_net_time = #{retireNetTime},
scope_business = #{scopeBusiness},
standby_links = #{standbyLinks}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select from company where no = #{no} and branch_id=#{branchId}
select from company where leader_tel = #{tel} and name =#{name} and branch_id=#{branchId}

select id,name from company
address like '%${address}%'

SELECT ce.* from (select ce.*,m.user_id from( SELECT,u.name creatorName,uu.name businessManagerName,cc.parent_id cityId,ccc.parent_id provinceId, cc.merger_name mergerName,b.value gradeName,lc.id logisticsCompanyId,lc.name logisticsCompanyName FROM (select c.*,u.name leaderName from company c left join user u on c.leader = u.id where c.id = #{companyId}) c left join user u on c.creator = u.id left join user uu on uu.id = c.business_manager left join city_area cc on c.city_area_id = cc.id left join city_area ccc on cc.parent_id = ccc.id left join basecode b on b.code = c.grade left join dealer_shipping_logistics ds on ds.company_id = c.id left join logistics_company lc on lc.id = ds.logistics_company_id where b.type = 'companyGrade' ) ce left join (select u.mobile,ce.company_id,ce.user_id,ce.created from (select ce.user_id,ce.company_id,ce.created from company_employee ce left join role r on ce.role_id = r.id) ce left join user u on ce.user_id = u.id ) m on ce.id = m.company_id order by m.created limit 1) ce

select (select count(*) from company where DATE_FORMAT(created, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE() , '%Y%m' )) as companyAdded, (select count(*) from company where status =1) as companySigned, (select count(*) from company where status =2) as companyQuited

select c.id,c.`name`,c.type,c.grade,count(cc.id) as cust_count,c.status,c.contract_time, ca.merger_name, u.name as business_manager_name, c.created from company c left join user u on c.business_manager = u.id left join city_area ca on c.city_area_id = ca.id left join company_customer cc on c.id=cc.company_id where c.id in (select company_id from dealer_account)
and c.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
AND c.city_area_id like CONCAT(#{cityAreaId},'%')
and c.type = #{type}
and c.status = #{status}
and DATE_FORMAT(c.created, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.created, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
group by c.id UNION select c.id,c.`name`,c.type,c.grade,0 as cust_count,c.status,c.contract_time,ca.merger_name,u.name as business_manager_name,c.created from company c left join user u on c.business_manager = u.id left join city_area ca on c.city_area_id = ca.id where c.id not in (select company_id from company_customer) and c.id in (select company_id from dealer_account)
and c.name like CONCAT('%',#{companyName},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.created, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND c.city_area_id like CONCAT(#{cityAreaId},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.created, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and c.type = #{type}
and c.status = #{status}

select c.id from company c,custom_order co where c.id=co.company_id and c.status = 1 and DATE_FORMAT(co.created, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(co.created, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') group by c.id order by count(*) desc limit 5

select c.id, (select count(*) from company_customer where company_id=#{companyId}) as custCount, (select count(*) from custom_order where company_id=#{companyId}) as orderCount, da.balance, c.name, da.nature, c.type, c.grade, IFNULL((select name from user where c.leader =id),'') as leaderName, c.leader_tel, (select name from user where id=c.business_manager) as business_managerName, IFNULL((select merger_short_name from city_area where c.city_area_id=id),'') as merger_short_name, c.address, c.lat, c.lng, c.`status`, c.business_manager, c.note, c.contract_time from company c inner join dealer_account da on da.company_id=c.id where c.id=#{companyId} and da.type=1
select type,count(id) as countTypes from company group by type
mapper.update: update dealer_account set balance = balance+#{amount} where type = #{type} and branch_id = #{branchId}
update dealer_account set balance = balance-#{amount} where type = #{type} and company_id = (select id from company where type = 0)
mapper.select: select balance from dealer_account where type = 1 and company_id=#{companyId}
select from company where type =#{type}

select c.name as companyName,a.merger_name,c.address, u.name as leaderName,c.leader_tel, us.name as businessManagerName from company c left join city_area a on c.city_area_id = a.id left join user u on u.id = c.leader left join user us on us.id = c.business_manager where c.id = #{companyId}

select c.id, c.name, substring(a.merger_name,4) as cityName, c.address,u.name as leaderName,c.leader_tel from company c left join city_area a on c.city_area_id = a.id left join user u on u.id = c.leader
and c.name like '%${name}%'
and c.city_area_id = ( select id from city_area where merger_name = #{cityName})
and c.id not in ('40ord3va6adp')
order by c.created asc

select (select count(*) from company_customer where company_id = #{id}) companyCustCount, (select count(*) from custom_order where company_id = #{id}) as companyOrderCount, (select balance from dealer_account where company_id = #{id} and type = 1) as balance, (select sum(balance) from dealer_account where company_id = #{id}) as sumBalance
select type,balance from dealer_account where company_id =#{id}

select count(distinct company_id) from custom_order
and created >= #{beginTime}
and (created <= #{endTime} or created like '%${endTime}%')
and created like '%${created}%'

select c.id, c.name, (select balance from dealer_account where type = 1 and company_id=a.company_id) as free_account, (select balance from dealer_account where type = 2 and company_id=a.company_id) as design_fee, (select balance from dealer_account where type = 3 and company_id=a.company_id) as bond from dealer_account a left join company c on c.id = a.company_id
c.name like CONCAT('%',#{companyName},'%')
AND c.branch_id = #{branchId}
group by company_id order by free_account desc
select count(id) from company where branch_id=#{branchId} and type != 0 and to_days(created) = to_days(now())
select count(id) from company where branch_id=#{branchId} and type != 0 and status=#{status} and to_days(created) = to_days(now())
select count(id) from company where branch_id=#{branchId} and type != 0 and status=#{status} and to_days(created) = to_days(now())

select co.id dealerId,co.name,co.type,co.status,co.founder_name leader_name,co.leader_tel,substring(ca.merger_name,4) as merger_name, co.address,co.lat,co.lng,us.name business_manager_name,co.contract_time,co.contract_expired_date,co.other_fund_remarks,co.account_balances_remarks,co.note ,b.value gradeName from company co left join user us on us.id=co.business_manager left join city_area ca on co.city_area_id = ca.id left join basecode b on b.code = co.grade where co.branch_id=#{branchId} and co.id=#{dealerId} and b.type = 'companyGrade'

select from company c left join user u on c.leader = u.id left join city_area aaa on aaa.id = c.city_area_id left join city_area aa on aa.id = aaa.parent_id left join city_area a on a.id = aa.parent_id where c.id = #{currCompanyId}

select ,u.sex,basis.education from company_employee c left join user u on c.user_id = u.id left join user_basis basis on u.id = basis.user_id left join role r on c.role_id = r.id left join employee_info info on c.id = info.company_employee_id left join basecode b on u.sex = b.code left join basecode bb on basis.education = bb.code left join basecode bbb on c.status = bbb.code where (b.type = 'userSex' or b.type is null) and (bb.type = 'userEducation' or bb.type is null) and (bbb.type = 'employeeStatus' or bbb.type is null) and u.id = #{currUserId}

select (select count(*) from company where date_format(created,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and branch_id=#{branchId} and status=0)as intentionNum, (select count(*) from company where date_format(created,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and branch_id=#{branchId} and status=1)as SignNum, (select count(*) from company where id in (select company_id from custom_order where date_format(created,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') )and branch_id=#{branchId})as placeOrder
